bibl.title: 7Q5 = Mark 6.52-53. A Challenge for Textual Critiscism?
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - How to Publish a Papyrus. - Reading 7Q5. - Identifying 7Q5. - Problems of the Identification. - Shows that the alleged identification of 7Q5 as a text of Mark's Gospel is very speculative.

bibl.title: Journal of Greco-Roman Christianity and Judaism

bibl.seg: FÖRSTER Hans, 7Q5 = Mark 6.52-53. A Challenge for Textual Critiscism?
Journal of Greco-Roman Christianity and Judaism 2 (2001-2005) pp. 27-35. <http://divinity.mcmaster.ca/jgrchj/home>

[Introduction.] - How to Publish a Papyrus. - Reading 7Q5. - Identifying 7Q5. - Problems of the Identification. - Shows that the alleged identification of 7Q5 as a text of Mark's Gospel is very speculative.
